about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in "The Maze," a roguelite, maze-solving adventure game that fuses both retro and modern cooperative gameplay. At its heart, The Maze is a thrilling journey of strategy and wits, where players must maneuver through intricate levels while outsmarting opponents in high-stakes cat-and-mouse chases.

Free to play during development at our website!

Drawing on gameplay elements across various genres, we've layered our unique interpretation onto this core mechanic, aiming to offer a game experience that's both familiar and fresh. Our straightforward interface masks a richly complex gameplay beneath, blending simplicity with depth in a way that appeals to both casual players and hardcore gaming enthusiasts.

Key Features:

Basic Maze-Solving Gameplay: At its core, The Maze is a game of strategy, where players must navigate their way through intricate mazes, outwitting opponents and evading dangers.
Varied Game Modes: Beyond the basic gameplay, we are planning a variety of game modes that will add layers of complexity and challenge, including modes focused on exploration, survival, timed races, cooperative play, dungeon exploration, and infinitely scaling challenges.
Retro and Modern Blend: Inspired by classic retro games and modern cooperative releases, The Maze offers a unique fusion of old and new, delivering an experience that's both nostalgic and innovative.
Player Feedback Centric: As a debut release from our studio, The Maze is actively being developed with player feedback in mind, ensuring the game evolves in a way that resonates with our community.
In The Maze, you won't just solve puzzles, you'll also strategize, dodge dangers, and potentially unlock new powers, making every run a unique journey. As you ascend through the game, expect the unexpected and prepare yourself for the thrill that comes with each twist and turn.

Please note that The Maze is still in its Early Access stage, which means there's a lot more to come in terms of content, features, and refinements. Join us now and be part of shaping this exciting adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Maze: a roguelite, maze-solving adventure fusing retro & modern co-op gameplay. Master a simple interface, explore intricate levels with varied mechanics & game modes. Outwit opponents in cat-and-mouse chases, dodge dangers, and unlock powers to reach the exit.
